title: Uncle Si Is Ticked Off About What Happened at Walmart
description:
Si is salty about what happened to him during a trip to Walmart, but Martin and John-David can't take Si's side on this one! Martin is the key witness in a crime, and Godwin is baffled by what the perps stole. Si tells all about his top-secret clearance and shares an unusual story about duck hunting that may or may not be 95% true. Si reveals how he kicked the habit that gave him COPD. And John-David gives advice on how to nurture your faith if you struggle with religion and going to church.
-
